segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me so sad to see the mess it’s creating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and I’m afraid he’s going to fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting so patiently, but I feel bad that the boy might not be able to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, and it’s sad that she’s missing what’s happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so wet, and it’s just going to make more work for someone later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is trying so hard, but it’s just not safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and it’s such a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, but I’m worried she’s going to be disappointed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and I just feel bad for the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the water soon before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
